unnormalised: Preparations are in full swing in Ayodhya for the highly anticipated Ram Mandir inauguration ceremony scheduled for 22/01/2024. Security has been beefed up and final touches are being added to the temple complex. The event is expected to draw VVIPs and devotees from across India.
normalised: Preparations are in full swing in Ayodhya for the highly anticipated Ram Mandir inauguration ceremony scheduled for twenty second january two thousand and twenty four. Security has been beefed up and final touches are being added to the temple complex. The event is expected to draw V-V-I-Ps and devotees from across India.

unnormalised: The main event will begin at 11:00 AM IST with the Pran Pratishtha ceremony, followed by speeches from dignitaries. Cultural performances are also planned throughout the day. Several special trains have been arranged to transport attendees, with arrivals expected to peak between 19/01/2024 and 21/01/2024.
normalised: The main event will begin at eleven zero zero A-M I-S-T with the Pran Pratishtha ceremony, followed by speeches from dignitaries. Cultural performances are also planned throughout the day. Several special trains have been arranged to transport attendees, with arrivals expected to peak between nineteenth january two thousand and twenty four and twenty first january two thousand and twenty four.

unnormalised: The city is undergoing a major facelift in anticipation of the large crowds, with road widening and beautification projects underway. Local businesses are preparing for a surge in demand, and authorities are coordinating to ensure a smooth and safe event on 22/1/24. The celebrations are expected to continue well into the evening, possibly stretching into 23/01/2024.
normalised: The city is undergoing a major facelift in anticipation of the large crowds, with road widening and beautification projects underway. Local businesses are preparing for a surge in demand, and authorities are coordinating to ensure a smooth and safe event on twenty second january two thousand and twenty four. The celebrations are expected to continue well into the evening, possibly stretching into twenty third january two thousand and twenty four.
